name: Mod an Onchain Game in One Hour
description:
This session will guide participants through the process of:

1. Making their own custom client for a MUD game (Sky Strife).
2. Deploying their own contracts on an existing Sky Strife world to start building their own game on top of it.

The finished product will serve as their own starting point for modifying any existing MUD application.

speakers.name: kooshaba
speakers.bio: kooshaba works at Lattice and is currently lead developer of Sky Strife. Previously, he worked on Dark Forest as a developer and game designer.
